channel.title: Help
channel.description: can some one help me take of members and f2p on my server to make it all Members?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

On another topic

thanks i gave you a reward :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 03:29:34 AM[/size][hr]oh btw do u know about the wepons that are member?

Uhhh tell me what weapons and I can probably help.
But I have to go right now so if you are on a silab client or moparscape just right click the item get the id and press ctrl F inside of client.java and then type in the id and if you find the member thing delete it and if it is just like 1 boolean or void or something just stating its members just copy and paste the boolean or void or whatever it is inside a new txt document incase you have to re-add because you get a compiler error.
If you get an error though just re add it and edit the member == 1 side to 0.

Read full topic

do u know how to edit the wepons that are member

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Ok

  1. For portals go into client.java and search for the id of the portal you don’t wan’t to be just for members.
    Find something similar to if(membership == 1); or something allong the lines of that.
    Delete both the 1 and the one that states that it equals 0 and delete whatever it would say if you weren’t a member.

  2. For vengance go in and find what it says when you cast vengance.
    Delete the same thing you did above.

And if there are any other things you need just let me know and I will attempt to help you.

Read full topic
